Articles.Content: In my opinion, it would add a lot of realism and would help with cinematics. Heck, you could stage the movie Gravity again with a girl kerbal! Say what you want about the idea. And remember: IT'S AN IDEA! NOT A DEMAND! I don't mind if it isn't implemented within the next few updates and beyond. Thank you.

In before lock.

More seriously this is on the what not to suggest list and has been discussed endlessly.
NOPE! heck kerbals might not be males! they might not have any gender! (like frogs perhaps?)

NOPE! heck kerbals might not be males! they might not have any gender! (like frogs perhaps?)

High time to re-visit your biology lessons. Frogs DO have genders!

But you're right about Kerbals.
no, I said that if they have genders, they can perhaps change it at will! like frogs!
Already happening 'when it can be done right' or words to that effect

This is indeed on the WNTS list. No point to push this further, it is already known.

Also, warning to the posters above me: Saying "inb4 lock" and stuff in the same line of thought, is rather useless. Report the post and let the moderators do they're job.

This said, thread locked.
